definition: suffix of a noun of locality

sentences.english: Lago Grande, Westhaven Heights and El Prado by the Lake are some of the communities.
sentences.chinese: 湖大，拋入高地和埃爾普拉多在湖邊的一些社區。

sentences.english: Seeing the tent and yak skin boat they know that the three men are in trouble.
sentences.chinese: 看見湖邊的帳篷和牛皮船知道他們有事就過來了。

sentences.english: After picnic the children begin to fly kites. Mr. and Mr. Jackson go fishing by the lake.
sentences.chinese: 午餐後孩子們開始放風箏，傑克遜夫婦在湖邊釣魚。

sentences.english: I like walking on the stone steps beside the lake, looking at the swimming goldfish.
sentences.chinese: 喜歡走在湖邊的石階上，看着裏面的金魚游來游去。

sentences.english: 2he saw at the water's edge two boats, left there by the fishermen, who were washing their nets.
sentences.chinese: 他見有兩隻船灣在湖邊，打魚的人卻離開船洗網去了。

sentences.english: The smooth road sloped invitingly before her.
sentences.chinese: 路緩緩地向湖邊傾斜下去。

sentences.english: Silence, then the Sunday sounds of our house by the lake.
sentences.chinese: 寂靜，之後我們房屋週末的聲音飄蕩在湖邊。

sentences.english: Of a summer on Sunday, I take a walk in the bar street of lakefront .
sentences.chinese: 一個夏日的星期天，我在湖邊的酒吧街散步。

sentences.english: We will have our picnic there in the small woods by the lake.
sentences.chinese: 我們將在湖邊的小樹林裏野餐。

sentences.english: The contaminants included emissions from small factories and crab farms along the shore.
sentences.chinese: 污染物涉及小工廠和湖邊的螃蟹養殖場的排放物。

sentences.english: He used to oversee my place on the lake, and did it capitally, too.
sentences.chinese: 他替我看管湖邊那所別墅，管理得非常出色。

sentences.english: After picnic the children begin to fly kites. Mr. and Mr. Jackson go fishing by the lake.
sentences.chinese: 午餐後孩子們起頭放風箏，傑克遜佳耦在湖邊垂釣。

sentences.english: They built a wall round the shore of the lake to retain the water.
sentences.chinese: 他們沿着湖邊築起一道堤來擋水。

sentences.english: Full-height glazing on this level provides views over the perimeter wall to the lake beyond.
sentences.chinese: 上層的全玻璃幕牆提供了到湖邊的視野。

sentences.english: And it came to pass, that, as the people pressed upon him to hear the word of God, he stood by the lake of Gennesaret
sentences.chinese: 耶穌站在革尼撒勒湖邊，衆人擁擠他，要聽神的道。

definition: edge of the water/waterside/shore (of sea, lake or river)
variant of 陽臺|阳台[yang2 tai2]
